duties_responsibilities.duty: Performs preventive/corrective maintenance, calibration, and upkeep of manufacturing and production equipment.
Develops and implements preventive maintenance and predictive maintenance programs.
Assists with engineering projects including equipment installation, commissioning, and validation process.
Maintains accurate records of parts, materials, and consumables used during the performance of work.
Assists in equipment failure root cause analysis with a prompt resolution.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma with 8 years of Process GMP Mechanical experience in a Pharma-Biotech manufacturing environment or school certification with 4 years of Process GMP Mechanical experience in a Pharma-Biotech manufacturing environment
